com.datastax.driver.core.policies

Interface CloseableLoadBalancingPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Host.StateListener, LoadBalancingPolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DCAwareRoundRobinPolicy, LatencyAwarePolicy, RoundRobinPolicy, TokenAwarePolicy, WhiteListPolicy

    public interface CloseableLoadBalancingPolicy
extends LoadBalancingPolicy
    A load balancing policy that wants to be notified at cluster shutdown. The only reason that this is separate from LoadBalancingPolicy is to avoid breaking binary compatibility at the time this was introduced (2.0.7 / 2.1.3). It might be merged with the parent interface in a future major version.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Gets invoked at cluster shutdown.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.driver.core.policies.LoadBalancingPolicy

        distance, init, newQueryPlan

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.driver.core.Host.StateListener

        onAdd, onDown, onRemove, onSuspected, onUp

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Gets invoked at cluster shutdown. This gives the policy the opportunity to perform some cleanup, for instance stop threads that it might have started.
